name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of RADIUS
id: stories/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of RADIUS

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of RADIUS #1: {setValue=0, actualValue=1, regression-widgets=}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
Open page
When change value of ZipCode {90015} on Event Discovery Widget Page
Set postal code api value: 90015
And use GeoPosition on Event Discovery Widget page
Use geo position
And set Radius {0} on Event Discovery Widget page
Set radius: 0
Then Radius value is {1} on Event Discovery Widget page
Check that radius value equals actual value: 1

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of RADIUS

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given open Event Discovery Widget page
